about_the_game:
"Girls Tennis League" is a tennis game that restores the movements of professional athletes and adds super power hitting to enrich the elements of the game. The game supports most handle operations on the market. Up to 4 players can play doubles matches on one host.
Game Features:
- Unleash flats, topspins, slices, lobs and volleys with different buttons
- Different stadiums and environments like clay, grass, hard courts or indoor courts.
-Experience different game modes such as Career, Grand Slam Tennis and Online Matchmaking.
- Surprise your opponents by hitting the ball with your skills and turning the game around.
- Play with a variety of different players, each with their own unique style of play.
-Challenge random players in the world in real time.
- Realistic physics engine and cloth engine.
detailed_description:
"Girls Tennis League" is a tennis game that restores the movements of professional athletes and adds super power hitting to enrich the elements of the game. The game supports most handle operations on the market. Up to 4 players can play doubles matches on one host.
Game Features:
- Unleash flats, topspins, slices, lobs and volleys with different buttons
- Different stadiums and environments like clay, grass, hard courts or indoor courts.
-Experience different game modes such as Career, Grand Slam Tennis and Online Matchmaking.
- Surprise your opponents by hitting the ball with your skills and turning the game around.
- Play with a variety of different players, each with their own unique style of play.
-Challenge random players in the world in real time.
- Realistic physics engine and cloth engine.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina or later
  • Processor: Intel i5 4770HQ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Girls Tennis League

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The STEAM version of the popular 3D independent tennis game "Girls Tennis League" is now online! Real tennis action, supports up to 4 players local doubles and online match, fully supports controller operation, permanent update, and many functions waiting for you to experience.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
